channel.title: Compiler
channel.description: Ok i know i made a post about this already dont get mad yet. Im doing this on my real computer now, so i need the info again. Can someone tell me what to put in the compiler thing when i press compile then edit? Thanks To all that will help me

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

NOTHING IS WRONG WITH YOUR COMPILER!!!FOR THE MILLIONTH TIME IN YOUR 5000TH THREAD ITS SUPPOSE TO SAY

NOte:stream.java uses or overrides a depreciated API
NOte: recompile with -XLint:depraciation for detals

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

ty but when i press compile it says this:
NOte:stream.java uses or overrides a depreciated API
NOte: recompile with -XLint:depraciation for detals

When i press run it says this:
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NOCLASSDEFFound error: simple GUi

what do i do now?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Uh… no actually it didnt, just on page 9 or 10. You need to use the search button next time.

Don't use the compile.bat, Use what I told you here:

No need for reward:

Compile.bat:

@echo off title Compile "C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_03/bin/javac" *.java pause

Runserver.bat

@echo off title Run Java SimpleGUI pause

Use those for your files, and for compile.bat, replace “jdk1.6.0_03” with the jdk you have. To find out:

  1. Start -> Run
  2. Type: c:/program files/java
  3. The jdk folder in there is the type of java you have. Replace the jdk in the compile.bat with the java folder name.

[hr]

Basically its using two files, one to compile and one to run it. Copy and paste each one of those into a notepad and save Compile.bat as , Compile.bat and save as: All Files, not just *.txt The n the other one as run.bat

Then,
Compile = Compile Server
Run = Run Server

Understand?

Read full topic
